ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] hey ppl read this  if intrested in equestrielle
ygData.msgSnippet: PLEASE.... in the name of all that is holy... could you learn to spell out complete words? Is it really that difficult? R is not a word... neither is u ....
ygData.messageBody:
PLEASE.... in the name of all that is holy... could you learn to spell out
complete words? Is it really that difficult? "R" is not a word... neither is
"u"....

*groans and once again is glad she plays on a server that at least has less
d00ds than others*

~Kyndara Silverleaf~
Pathfinder of Karana,
Firiona Vie
